name: Get Comfortable
description:
You and your chum are having a sweet night-nap in the same bad, but it feels like the more you move around, the less bed there is to share!

Controls are: arrow keys. You might need to click the iframe so that it receives keyboard events!

I made this for Ludum Dare 48, my first time trying to actually make something with PICO-8. A resounding success! I'm really happy with how it turned out, I had a blast making it, and I didn't even need to stay up all night. Hell yes.
